name: Heroes & Dungeons
description:
Rebuild your kingdom ravaged by monsters! Hire heroes, explore dungeons, fight monsters, rescue villagers and retrieve stolen treasure. Soon you'll have a bustling kingdom full of houses, taverns and castles at your disposal!

FEATURES
• Use the touch screen to slash monsters and block their attacks!
• Dozens of different heroes to hire!
• Rescue hundreds of loyal subjects and their families. Each person is unique!
• Explore over 20 different dungeons full of monsters and treasure!
• Master a variety of magic spells!
• Customize your kingdom with different types of buildings, castles and decorations!
• Produce food to level up your heroes and make them stronger!
• Earn money from your loyal subjects to buy more buildings and pay heroes!
• Find and equip rare magic rings!
• Use the Kingdom Economy Report to see how your kingdom is improving day by day!
• Take a photo of your kingdom to share with friends!
• Supports Game Center with high scores and achievements!
